Status: prototype Prototype Visual posts

What will Visual articles look like if they're moved to the ONS Website?

User need

I need all ONS articles in the same place.

Context

We are migrating content from Visual.ONS to ONS.GOV.UK. We need to check how articles will work when they are move over. We want to remove as much page furniture as possible.
